verbs.description: In today 's edition : Trump pressures [ARG0: top law enforcement and intelligence officers] to [V: turn] over [ARG1: information] [ARG2: to Congress] and the CIA gets a new director while Trump laments an old one

In today 's edition : Trump pressures top law enforcement and intelligence officers to turn over information to Congress and [ARG0: the CIA] [V: gets] [ARG1: a new director] [ARGM-ADV: while Trump laments an old one]

In today 's edition : Trump pressures top law enforcement and intelligence officers to turn over information to Congress and the CIA gets a new director while [ARG0: Trump] [V: laments] [ARG1: an old one]
